Tessa is a 17 year-old in love with life. Diagnosed with a terminal illness, she decides to make good use of every moment by making a list of everything that a normal teenager would experience. With the help of a friend, she begins to implement the list items. Tessa begins to explore a new world and live each day to its fullest. In between, the girl falls for Adam, an item that was not on the list, but it proves the most invigorating experience of all.
